content: I think I'll wait until I arrive in Melbourne to open a bank account and apply for a debit or credit card. I don't want to deal with the hassle of trying to figure out the online application system, and I'd rather get assistance from a representative in person. Can you tell me more about the types of mobile payment options available in Australia, such as Apple Pay, Google Pay, or Samsung Pay? Are they widely accepted, and are there any fees associated with using them?
